name: Competency Log
description: The Competency Log Brightspace Data Set returns data changes to the competency structure.   Returned Fields

columns.name: LogTypeName
columns.description: Name of the log type. Field can be null.

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: Identifier for the object that created the change in the competency structure recorded in the log.

columns.name: ObjectTypeId
columns.description: Identifier for the object type that created the change in the competency structure recorded in the log.

columns.name: ObjectTypeName
columns.description: Name of the object type. Field can be null.

columns.name: ObjectVersion
columns.description: Version of the object that created the change in the competency structure

columns.name: LogDateTime
columns.description: Time and date of the entry in the log (UTC).

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User who modified the competency structure.

columns.name: IndirectObjectId
columns.description: Identifier for the indirect object that created the change in the log. Field can be null.

columns.name: IndirectObjectTypeName
columns.description: Name of the indirect object type. Field can be null.

columns.name: IndirectObjectTypeId
columns.description: Identifier of the type of indirect object that created the change in the log. Field can be null.

columns.name: IndirectObjectVersion
columns.description: Version of the object that indirectly created the change in the log. Field can be null.
